price: Rabbiin araarama kadhu. Dhugumatti Rabbiin akkaan araaramaa, akkaan rahmata godhaa ta'eera.
arabic: وَٱسۡتَغۡفِرِ ٱللَّهَۖ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ كَانَ غَفُورٗا رَّحِيمٗا

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: wa-is'taghfiri al-laha inna al-laha kāna ghafūran raḥīman
